PART D
Log-Likelihood of unigram: -44.236429985727085
Log-Likelihood of bigram:  undefined

Missing P(134|148), P(444|500)
The pairs (FOURTEEN, OFFICIALS) and (SOLD, FIRE) are 
not observed in the training corpus.

The effect that this had cause the log-likelihood of
the bigram to be undefined because of trying to take
the natural log of 0.

PART E
The optimal value of lambda is 0.01 which equals 
-35.8087389213241
